div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"0_2","props":{"name":"text2","class":"mx-name-text2 pageheader-subtitle text-detail","style":{},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Some examples of executed activities during the first few weeks of getting acquainted with Mendix."],"friendlyId":"MyDemo.Home.text2"}},"renderMode":"p"}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"0_4","props":{"name":"text3","class":"mx-name-text3","style":{},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["After the first contact with Mendix I followed the Rapid Developer Training, passed the exam and followed the Advanced training. in this project I gather demos of modules and widgets that I create along the way."],"friendlyId":"MyDemo.Home.text3"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"0_6","props":{"name":"text4","class":"mx-name-text4","style":{},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["- The Iot Demo showing traffic data
- The SAP interface
- Using a microflow for sorting an unindexed list
- Unittest
- Load test
- Template page for any two tables having a 1-n association
- Filedocument
- Show running two Mendixprojects on your local host
- Show database inconsistency"],"friendlyId":"MyDemo.Home.text4"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]
